For the recommendations, I think that I would say CHMs, MSIs, MSIXs, CLIQ1s, complex chains
are kind of a way to proceed now.
I would hold on on the LNKs because the vendors are getting so much better at hunting and
dissecting those, CPLs and XLLs that are also kind of a triggering, triggering alarms like
a Christmas tree, and then I would probably just move away from Office Macros because
of the fact how much, how much effective Mark of the Web enforcement was actually.
And in this way, I would like to thank you very much guys for your time and attention.
